PropertyDefinition.description: If selected this is an over-the-counter instrument.

PropertyDefinition.description: The pay type of the instrument: Spot, Forward or Future.

PropertyDefinition.name: Premium
PropertyDefinition.description: Premium paid for the trade, excluding premiums entered as additional payments and excluding fees.

PropertyDefinition.description: Quantity of deal or IPV position

PropertyDefinition.name: Total Profit and Loss
PropertyDefinition.description: The total profit and loss for a position or portfolio.

PropertyDefinition.name: Total Profit and Loss EUR
PropertyDefinition.description: The total profit and loss for a position or portfolio in accounting currency.

PropertyDefinition.name: Trade Datetime
PropertyDefinition.description: Trade date and time of deal

PropertyDefinition.name: Trade Price
PropertyDefinition.description: The price at which the trade was executed.

PropertyDefinition.name: Trade Status
PropertyDefinition.description: Shows the current stage in the life of a trade. The possibility to change the trade status is regulated by the privileges of the user.

PropertyDefinition.name: Trade Update Time
PropertyDefinition.description: Time when trade was last updated.

PropertyDefinition.name: Delivery Number
PropertyDefinition.description: Identitifer of the data-load from IRMa.

PropertyDefinition.name: FO Fixing
PropertyDefinition.description: Front Office traders rate to publish

PropertyDefinition.name: FO Overrun Description
PropertyDefinition.description: FO Overrun Description as loaded from IRMa.

PropertyDefinition.name: FO Overrun Freetext
PropertyDefinition.description: FO overrun freetext loaded from IRMa.

PropertyDefinition.name: Identical
PropertyDefinition.description: Used to indicate that the published fixing price matched the FO price exactly.

PropertyDefinition.name: Post Check Status
PropertyDefinition.description: A status indicating the result of the post-check (ie whether the values were different or not).

PropertyDefinition.name: Pre Check Status
PropertyDefinition.description: A status indicating the result of the pre-check (ie whether it was an outlier or not).

PropertyDefinition.name: Rates Diff
PropertyDefinition.description: Difference between Published Rate and FO Fixing.

PropertyDefinition.name: RC Pre-Check
PropertyDefinition.description: This can be set to Approved or Not Approved

CellDefinition.Value: Ranges.Values(LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 1, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 2, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 3, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 4, 1, 2))
Values(Values(RangeEnds - ColumnCount + 1, RangeEnds), IF(MAX(RangeEnds) = WhitelistRows, Values(NULL, NULL), Values(MAX(RangeEnds) + 1, WhitelistRows))).TRANSPOSE.FLATTEN.Where(Column_1 ! NULL)

PropertyDefinition.description: Flag to indicate whether IPV check is needed

PropertyDefinition.description: Difference Between VuT and Reference Price

CellDefinition.Value: Ranges.Values(LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 1, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 2, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 3, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 4, 1, 2))
Values(Values(RangeEnds - ColumnCount + 1, RangeEnds), IF(MAX(RangeEnds) = WhitelistRows, Values(NULL, NULL), Values(MAX(RangeEnds) + 1, WhitelistRows))).TRANSPOSE.FLATTEN.Where(Column_1 ! NULL)

CellDefinition.Value: Ranges.Values(LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 1, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 2, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 3, 1, 2), LOOKUP(WLSorted, Column_1 + 4, 1, 2))
Values(Values(RangeEnds - ColumnCount + 1, RangeEnds), IF(MAX(RangeEnds) = WhitelistRows, Values(NULL, NULL), Values(MAX(RangeEnds) + 1, WhitelistRows))).TRANSPOSE.FLATTEN.Where(Column_1 ! NULL)
